# Compare bcbio runs


Diagram
-------

```{r gr1}
set.seed(42)

ndf <- 
  tribble(
    ~id, ~label, ~type,
    1, "vcf1", "file",
    2, "vcf2", "file",
    3, "bcftools-view-f", "command",
    4, "vcf1_pass", "file",
    5, "vcf2_pass", "file",
    6, "bcftools-isec", "command",
    7, "FP-FN-TP", "file",
    8, "FP-FN-TP_pass", "file",
    9, "count-vars", "command",
    10, "counts", "file",
    11, "counts_pass", "file") %>% 
  mutate(
    fillcolor = case_when(
      type == "file" ~ "lightblue",
 
           type == "command" ~ "#f48f42",
      TRUE ~ "#eef442"
    ),
    fontcolor = "black")

edf <- 
  create_edge_df(
    from = c(1, 2, 3, 3, 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 6, 1, 2, 4, 5, 9, 9),
    to =   c(3, 3, 4, 5, 6, 6, 6, 6, 7, 8, 9, 9, 9, 9, 10, 11)
  )


create_graph(nodes_df = ndf, edges_df = edf) %>% 
  set_node_attrs(
    node_attr = "fontsize",
    values = "8"
  ) %>% 
  render_graph(layout = "tree")
```
